meaning: 1. Play the leading role 2. Take on an important responsibility

examples.chinese: 青年演员此次担纲主演
examples.translation: The young actor takes on the leading role this time.

examples.chinese: 他几乎在所有比赛里都担纲重任
examples.translation: He takes on important responsibilities in almost all matches.
Young cadres should take on the main responsibility.

examples.chinese: 同事有事我临时担纲工作
examples.translation: I temporarily took charge of the work because my colleague had something to do.
